Description: Blue glass bead bearing the name of Thutmose III.
Curator's comments: Published: S. Birch, Catalogue of the Collection of Egyptian Antiquities at Alnwick Castle, London 1880, pp. 216-217 [1614]. This object once bore the BM number 65662, now assigned to a Coptic textile. It has also, erroneously, borne the number 68544.
